headline: Elon Musk Says 'Maybe We'll Meet Aliens,' Reaffirms Lunar Mass Driver, Deep-Space AI Satellite Goals
summary: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk shared the possibility of encountering extraterrestrial life as space travel technology and orbital datacenters evolve. headline: Why The Tesla TSLA Narrative Is Shifting On AI Bets, Energy Ambitions And Valuation Risks
summary: Tesla's latest valuation update nudges the modelled fair value from US$418.76 to US$421.73, while also slightly lifting the discount rate from 10.06% to 10.11% and trimming the assumed long term revenue growth from 14.66% to 14.18%. This blend of a higher required return and more conservative growth, alongside a modestly higher future P/E, reflects how the current debate around full self driving, robotaxis, physical AI, and energy is feeding into what investors are willing to pay for Tesla's...

headline: Tesla Paid No Federal Income Tax While Elon Musk Could Earn $3 Billion More Than U.S. Teachers Combined, Says Robert Reich —'See the Problem?'
summary: Tesla's numbers are usually discussed in miles per charge or market value. This time, the conversation is about taxes, pay, and a comparison designed to make people stop scrolling. Earlier this month on Facebook, former U.S. Labor Secretary Robert Reich wrote, "Tesla reported paying ZERO federal income tax in 2025." He followed with the comparison that drove the post's attention: "Meanwhile, thanks to his new Tesla pay package, Elon Musk could stand to make $3 billion more per year than all 1.4

summary: Tesla (NasdaqGS:TSLA) is repurposing Model S and Model X production lines to build its Optimus humanoid robots. These moves mark a shift in Tesla's core business priorities away from certain legacy vehicle models toward robotics and mobility services. Tesla started as an electric vehicle and energy company, and for many investors it is still closely linked to its car...

headline: SpaceX Reportedly Considering Dual Class Shares To Keep Elon Musk In Control After IPO
summary: SpaceX is reportedly eyeing a dual-class share structure for its highly anticipated IPO later this year. The move would let billionaire founder Elon Musk maintain iron-grip control over the rocket maker even as he taps public markets for cash. The two-tier setup mirrors a strategy Musk has publicly championed for Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA), giving select insiders supervoting shares that dominate corporate decision-making. Critics say the structure shields executives from accountability, but Musk ha

headline: Tesla Finally Broke Its Weekly Losing Streak. Now It’s Falling Again.
summary: Tesla  stock was down to start a shortened week for markets after the Presidents Day holiday—trading near “support” levels. The result of recent trading has left Tesla stock trading near support levels.
